name: 布赖恩·米特尔施泰特
name_full: 布赖恩·米特尔施泰特 Bryan Mittelstadt

last_movies.title: 散户大战华尔街：游戏驿站传奇

introduction: Bryan Mittelstadt is an actor, singer, and writer based in Los Angeles. After moving 14 times as a military kid, mostly in Texas, he graduated with an MFA in Acting from University of Connecticut. His work has been recognized in Academy and BAFTA qualifying festivals around the world and has also worked in regional theatres leading Chekov's, The Cherry Orchard, Grease, Henry VI, As You Like It, and Little Shop of Horrors. While he is known for his dynamic and complex roles in dramatic and darker roles, he has recently been adding a list of comedic roles, being recognized at the LA Shorts Festival.He is passionate about creating his own work, whether that be in writing, editing, producing, or songwriting, and is looking forward to the half dozen features releasing in 2024. In his free time, he loves to read, enjoy the great outdoors, play guitar, and spend time in with wine and board games.
